```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=5, out.width="80%", fig.cap='This is a map of Canada, projected using the NAD 83 UTM Zone 7 Datum.'}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)
library(sf)

canada <- read_sf("data/Canada.geojson")


ggplot() +
  ggspatial::layer_spatial(canada, fill = "grey") +
  coord_sf() +
  theme_solarized() +
  # theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0,0), "in")) +
  NULL

```
